full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA LA SER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS MA TSOGS LHUN GRUB MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(NGAG DBANG RAB CAR, ,BE CHE GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA, ,ME DANG ME MIN GYI MOD PA CHAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA, RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG RUNG SHIN TU MTHO ZHING PHRAD ? @004B TSOGS PA DANG PA DANG DAM TSIG GTZAD NA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THU SHE YI KUNG KHUN TI LING DUR GIG CHI TSE RING RDO RJE DON DU, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS SO, BSTAN YONGS LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
